In Experiment <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the external magnetic field is removed, and the students hold a second current-carrying rod parallel to the rod attached to the force sensor. Both rods have the same unknown current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math>. The students are asked to use a graph to experimentally determine the current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math>.
